Data.text_description:
The probability of job satisfaction being high (A=1) is 0.7300. 
The probability of stress level being high (B=1) is 0.5570. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0) and stress level being low (B=0), the probability of physical health being high (C=1) is 0.3484. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0) and stress level being high (B=1), the probability of physical health being high (C=1) is 0.1528. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1) and stress level being low (B=0), the probability of physical health being high (C=1) is 0.4373. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1) and stress level being high (B=1), the probability of physical health being high (C=1) is 0.2077. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0), the probability of government policies being high (D=1) is 0.8402. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1), the probability of government policies being high (D=1) is 0.8798.
